alert.note: Alert for Humboldt County; Northeastern Nye County; Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Northwestern Nye County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 10:19AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...ELEVATED FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS AND PATCHY BLOWING DUST TODAY... Warm and very dry conditions continue today. Another round of gusty winds expected this afternoon and evening, especially across northeast and central Nevada. The winds, in combination with the dry weather, will result in elevated fire weather conditions across much of the region. In addition, blowing dust could reduce visibility down to a mile in areas. Please practice fire weather safety if out recreating this holiday weekend. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.
